column4: why do I get the error "The Program Setup.exe has encountered a serious problem and needs to close. We are sorry for the inconvenience." when trying to install adobe after effects using wine?
okay, where should I post it
winehq is the best place to discuss that stuff
If it's not platinum, you might need to make modifications to your wine configuration or program configuration to run things. Look through the posts on that application's appdb page.
